pages.text: When you open your inventory there is a search bar below the main window. You can use this to see crafting recipes for any item in the game. $(li)Left clicking on an item will show how to make it. $(li)Right clicking on an item will show what it can be used to make. $(br)This can be done in the recipe window as well. $(br2)Pressing the + sign will move the items from your inventory into a crafting table if one is open.
You can also use the search bar to look up mod names @<modname>, or by tooltip #<tooltip>. $(br)You can bookmark items to the left side of the screen by pressing A while pointing to them.
